home.content: I am a developer of Web, PWA, mobile applications, applying Unit Test and E2E Testing to applications under agile methodologies

can-do.title: What I can do?
can-do.web-apps: Creation of friendly and scalable web applications
can-do.pwa: Creation of web applications installable on mobile devices
can-do.automation: Automation of execution of Unit tests and E2E in FrontEnd as in BackEnd
can-do.ci-cd: Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment of applications delivering better quality and improvement in development times

about.title: About me
about.content: Passionate about technology, self-taught, committed and responsible. Interest in obtaining new knowledge for continuous improvement both professionally and personally Developments under an agile methodologies approach using good programming practices such as Clean Code, SOLID Principles

activities: Creating Unit Tests for Java software
Compliance with unit test metrics in SonarQube with Java
External device automation using Cypress for Angular FrontEnd
PWA Prototype creation in Angular for OnBoarding application
Successful affiliation Meta Developers for Facebook/WhatsApp API consumption
WhatsApp ChatBot pilot with Meta Developers API integration
WebHook creation to interact with WhatsApp Business events
Rest NestJS API creation for simulation of transactions and registration through WhatsApp
Creation of a tracking portal and registration of transport company receipts/invoices
Completion and maintenance Portal Management of School Notes, correction of minor bugs
Bug fixes in the medical sample management portal integrated with Auth0
Refactoring and Update FrontEnd Angular 8 to 12
Creating Unit Tests with Jasmine/Karma for code coverage in SonarQube
E2E Test Automation Pilot in Angular FrontEnd with Cypress

list.name: Systems Engineer
list.description: Graduated in first places in the honor roll of the university

proyects.name: Sky Scrapper
proyects.description: Price comparison of manga products from major stores in Peru using web scraping with Puppeteer, with historical price charts for each product, as well as the ability to generate our own wishlist with push notification alerts for discounts

proyects.name: Sky Bot
proyects.description: Interactive chatbot for management and registration of procedures through Facebook Messenger, integrated with Dialogflow for natural language understanding, with a web portal (PWA) integrated with Auth0

proyects.name: Sky Krono
proyects.description: Application for interactive attendance control management using a task calendar and push notifications in a PWA, with graphical attendance reports. It implements a WebAuthentication login standard for fingerprint or integrated device validation
